name: Meatloaf
instructions:
Cook onions and finely minced cooking vegetables with a pinch of salt until moisture evaporates then set aside. Mix panko with milk and sour cream then add to the meats with salt and blend well by hand or in a mixer. Mix in cooked veggies, eggs, garlic, worcestershire, mustard, ketchup, and pepper. Shape into loaf and refrigerate overnight.

Sear meat loaf under broiler for 5-10min until beginning to take on color on top. Add a layer of Meatloaf Glaze or ketchup and then load into a 325F oven to bake until internal temp reaches 165F.
